verses.verse: Who <S%G5607>was<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> to him that <S%G4160>appointed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> was faithful <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>. appointed: Gr. made

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> man was counted <S%G515>worthy<s%> of <S%G4119>more<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%>, inasmuch <S%G2596>as<s%> <S%G3745><s%> he who hath <S%G2680>builded<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> hath <S%G4119>more<s%> <S%G5092>honour<s%> <S%G2192>than<s%> the <S%G846>house<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> is <S%G2680>builded<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> man; <S%G1161>but<s%> he that <S%G2680>built<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> is <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3303>verily<s%> was <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G2324>servant<s%>, <S%G1519>for<s%> a <S%G3142>testimony<s%> of those things which were to be spoken <S%G2980>after<s%>;

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> his <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>; <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G4007><s%> we hold <S%G2722>fast<s%> the <S%G3954>confidence<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2745>rejoicing<s%> of the <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G949>firm<s%> <S%G3360>unto<s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%>.

<S%G1352>Wherefore<s%> I was <S%G4360>grieved<s%> with <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, They <S%G4105>do<s%> <S%G104>alway<s%> <S%G4105>err<s%> in their <S%G2588>heart<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G1097>have<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1097>known<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3598>ways<s%>.

<S%G5613>So<s%> I <S%G3660>sware<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3709>wrath<s%>, They <S%G1525>shall<s%> <S%G1487>not<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2663>rest<s%>.) They: Gr. If they shall enter

Take <S%G991>heed<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G3379>lest<s%> there <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> an <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> of <S%G570>unbelief<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G868>departing<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G3870>exhort<s%> one <S%G1438>another<s%> <S%G2596>daily<s%> <S%G1538><s%> <S%G2250><s%>, <S%G891>while<s%> <S%G3739><s%> it is <S%G2564>called<s%> To <S%G4594>day<s%>; <S%G3363>lest<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> be <S%G4645>hardened<s%> through the <S%G539>deceitfulness<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> we are <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G3353>partakers<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G4007><s%> we <S%G2722>hold<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> of our <S%G5287>confidence<s%> <S%G949>stedfast<s%> <S%G3360>unto<s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%>;

<S%G1722>While<s%> it is <S%G3004>said<s%>, To <S%G4594>day<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> ye will <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%>, <S%G4645>harden<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3894>provocation<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%>, when they had <S%G191>heard<s%>, did <S%G3893>provoke<s%>: <S%G235>howbeit<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G1831>came<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G125>Egypt<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> with <S%G5101>whom<s%> was he <S%G4360>grieved<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%>? was it <S%G3780>not<s%> with them that had <S%G264>sinned<s%>, <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G2966>carcases<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%>?

<S%G1161>And<s%> to <S%G5101>whom<s%> sware <S%G3660>he<s%> that they <S%G1525>should<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2663>rest<s%>, <S%G1508>but<s%> to them that believed <S%G544>not<s%>?
